text: Patricia Healey (1 January 1936, Dorset â€“ 4 February 2021, London) was a British singer and actress. ==Biography== She appeared in the UK films The White Bus (1967), Wuthering Heights (1968) and in the R3 television show between 1963 and 1964. Her last appearance was in the 1994 television mini- series Middlemarch. She was married to singer Engelbert Humperdinck. Healey, who had Alzheimer's disease, died on 4 February 2021 at 85, due to complications from COVID-19 during the COVID-19 pandemic in England. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:British singers Category:British actors Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:People with Alzheimer's disease Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in London
title: Patricia Healey
